segment.source: Server Isolation GPOs (Windows 10)
segment.target: Server Isolation GPOs (Windows 10)

segment.source: Server Isolation GPOs
segment.target: Server Isolation GPOs

segment.source: Server Isolation GPOs
segment.target: Server Isolation GPOs

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview
segment.target: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview

segment.source: Each set of devices that have different users or devices accessing them require a separate server isolation zone.
segment.target: Each set of devices that have different users or devices accessing them require a separate server isolation zone.

segment.source: Each zone requires one GPO for each version of Windows running on devices in the zone.
segment.target: Each zone requires one GPO for each version of Windows running on devices in the zone.

segment.source: The Woodgrove Bank example has an isolation zone for their devices that run SQL Server.
segment.target: The Woodgrove Bank example has an isolation zone for their devices that run SQL Server.

segment.source: The server isolation zone is logically considered part of the encryption zone.
segment.target: The server isolation zone is logically considered part of the encryption zone.

segment.source: Therefore, server isolation zone GPOs must also include rules for encrypting all isolated server traffic.
segment.target: Therefore, server isolation zone GPOs must also include rules for encrypting all isolated server traffic.

segment.source: Woodgrove Bank copied the encryption zone GPOs to serve as a starting point, and renamed them to reflect their new purpose.
segment.target: Woodgrove Bank copied the encryption zone GPOs to serve as a starting point, and renamed them to reflect their new purpose.

segment.source: All of the device accounts for devices in the SQL Server server isolation zone are added to the group CGSRVISOWGBANKSQL.
segment.target: All of the device accounts for devices in the SQL Server server isolation zone are added to the group CGSRVISOWGBANKSQL.

segment.source: This group is granted Read and Apply Group Policy permissions in on the GPOs described in this section.
segment.target: This group is granted Read and Apply Group Policy permissions in on the GPOs described in this section.

segment.source: The GPOs are only for server versions of Windows.
segment.target: The GPOs are only for server versions of Windows.

segment.source: Client devices are not expected to be members of the server isolation zone, although they can access the servers in the zone by being a member of a network access group (NAG) for the zone.
segment.target: Client devices are not expected to be members of the server isolation zone, although they can access the servers in the zone by being a member of a network access group (NAG) for the zone.

segment.source: GPOSRVISO
segment.target: GPOSRVISO

segment.source: This GPO is identical to the GPODOMISOEncryption GPO with the following changes:
segment.target: This GPO is identical to the GPODOMISOEncryption GPO with the following changes:

segment.source: The firewall rule that enforces encryption is modified to include the NAGs on the Users and Computers tab of the rule.
segment.target: The firewall rule that enforces encryption is modified to include the NAGs on the Users and Computers tab of the rule.

segment.source: The NAGs granted permission include CGNAGSQLUsers and CGNAGSQLComputers.
segment.target: The NAGs granted permission include CGNAGSQLUsers and CGNAGSQLComputers.

segment.source: Important: Earlier versions of Windows support only device-based authentication.
segment.target: Important: Earlier versions of Windows support only device-based authentication.

segment.source: If you specify that user authentication is mandatory, only users on devices that are running at least Windows Vista or Windows Server 2008 can connect.
segment.target: If you specify that user authentication is mandatory, only users on devices that are running at least Windows Vista or Windows Server 2008 can connect.
